alert.note: Alert for Bay; Midland; Saginaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 6:27AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with heavy rainfall in Bay, Saginaw and Midland Counties through 730 AM EDT... At 625 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bentley to near Sanford to near Carson City. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD... Heavy rainfall and wind gusts near 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT... Heavy rainfall and low visibility for motorists. Thunderstorms will be near... Midland and Pinconning around 640 AM EDT. Auburn and Freeland around 645 AM EDT. Zilwaukee around 700 AM EDT. Saginaw and Bridgeport around 705 AM EDT. Frankenmuth and Birch Run around 725 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Carrollton, Garfield, Arthur, Fenmore, Crump, Buena Vista Township, Gera, Indiantown, Bombay and Hemlock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is occurring with these storms and may lead to ponding of water on area roads.
